summary: This document outlines the operational plan for a search related to Jeffrey Epstein's case, specifically focusing on child sex trafficking. It serves as a record of the planning and approval process for the operation conducted on July 11, 2019.

persons.name: Jeffrey Epstein
persons.context: Jeffrey Epstein is the central figure in the investigation related to child sex trafficking.

events.title: Search Operation
events.description: A search operation was planned and documented as part of the investigation into Jeffrey Epstein's activities.

keyFacts: The document is an operational plan for a search related to Jeffrey Epstein.
The operation was scheduled for July 11, 2019.
The focus of the operation is on child sex trafficking.
